content: by midknight designs angel towel holder jennifer l christensen midknightstarr webs com midknightstarr@gmail com angel towel holder materials  cotton worsted weight yarn  g/4 25 mm hook  2 cabone ring  1 cabone ring  tapestry needle  optional 1/8 -1/4 satin ribbon ribbon rose fabric glue abbreviations chain chain single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet slp st slip_stitch st s stitch s decrease - decrease towel ring join with slp st on 2 cabone ring chain 1 single_crochet all around the ring to completely cover join with slp st in 1st single_crochet stitch count is not important at this time as long as the ring is fully covered strap row 1 chain 1 turn single_crochet in same st as chain 1 single_crochet in next 4 sts 5 single_crochet row 2-8 chain 1 turn half_double_crochet in same st as chain 1 half_double_crochet in next 4 sts 5 half_double_crochet row 9 chain 1 turn single_crochet decrease in next 2 sts single_crochet single_crochet decrease in next 2 sts finish off 3 single_crochet angels head join with slp st on 1 cabone ring chain 1 single_crochet in ring 20 x s 20 single_crochet joining with wrong sides of the ring and the strap together with the ring in the front working around the ring and through row 9 of strap single_crochet in each st of strap join with slp st of 1st st on ring 23 single_crochet do not finish off halo chain 2 slp st in next single_crochet 19 x s 19 chain 2 loops do not finish off wings/body row 1 slp st in next single_crochet chain 1 single_crochet in same st as chain 1 3 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in last st 5 single_crochet row 2 chain 1 turn 2 single_crochet in same st as chain 1 single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next st 2 single_crochet in last st 9 single_crochet row 3 chain 1 turn single_crochet in same st as chain 1 single_crochet in next 3 sts 3 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in last 4 st 11 single_crochet row 4 chain 1 turn single_crochet in same st as chain 1 2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next 3 sts 3 single_crochet n next st single_crochet in next 3 sts 2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in last st 15 single_crochet row 5 chain 1 turn 2 single_crochet in same st as chain 1 2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next 5 sts 3 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next 5 sts 2 single_crochet in last 2 sts 21 single_crochet row 6 chain 1 turn single_crochet in same st as chain 1 single_crochet in next st 2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next 7 sts 3 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next 7 sts 2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in last 2 sts 25 single_crochet row 7 chain 1 turn single_crochet in same st as chain 1 single_crochet in next 3 sts 2 single_crochet in next st
